page.title: 18BEDMINSTER DOWN BOYS CLUB
page.content: The{club}was opened about twenty one years ago and is now valued at about Â£300,000, including its' equipment. The equipment includes a high-fi system, space invaders, pinball machine, rifle range, gymnasium, van and trailer, caveing equipment, canoes and{sports equipment.} Subs. are 30p per week for the juniors' club which is on Tuesday and Thursday, and 40p for the seniors club which is on Monday, Wednesday and Friday. There is a club leader, who is paid and several voluntary helpers. {Sports}at the club include:- Cricket, Football, Basketball, Snooker, Pool, Table Tennis, Badminton, Boxing, and Swimming.
